explains: n. 码数；按码计算；火车站内栏舍之使用费

sentences.en: Vijay Singh says the course will not play as long as the yardage indicates.
sentences.cn: 维杰-辛格说这个洞虽然码数长，但不需要打很多杆。

sentences.en: The Chiefs nearly doubled the Ravens in total yardage and time of possession.
sentences.cn: 酋长队向前推进的距离和控球时间几乎是乌鸦队的两倍。

sentences.en: When you able to send me the shipment sample yardage as request?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候按要求给我寄运输样品码数呢？
